## DynamicControl interface

Describes the rendering, value and validation of an form control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicControl<TValueType, TFormState extends object | null = null, TQuestion extends Question<object | null, Partial<TFormState>> = Question<object | null, Partial<TFormState>>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [asyncStateValidators?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.asyncstatevalidators.md) | [AsyncStateValidator](./dynamic-forms.asyncstatevalidator.md)<!-- -->&lt;Maybe&lt;Partial&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt;&gt;\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Async state validators for the control value |
|  [panelClass?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.panelclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom class added to the anchor tag of the question component |
|  [question?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.question.md) | TQuestion | <i>(Optional)</i> The question component view configuration |
|  [questionComponent](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.questioncomponent.md) | Type&lt;[QuestionComponent](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;object \| null, Partial&lt;TFormState&gt;, TQuestion&gt;&gt; \| null | The question component that should be rendered |
|  [required?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.required.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to require a value before the form can be submitted |
|  [validators?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.validators.md) | ValidatorFn\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Validators for the control value |
|  [valueFormatter?](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.valueformatter.md) | ((value: Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;TValueType&gt;&gt;) =&gt; Maybe&lt;TValueType&gt;) | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom function for formatting the initial value before setting control. |
